product.Name: 1 day Child Metro/Bus
product.Description:
For children aged 5-15 inclusive.

Allows unlimited bus travel on all bus operator services* and the Metro throughout the Network West Midlands area plus an addtional 15 out of county areas for one day.

Cheaper with Swift Pay As You Go.

*Valid on the Midland Metro and bus services in the specified area run by operators in the nBus Ticket Scheme .
product.Summary: Regional travel on all buses, all day and the Metro. Cheaper with Swift Pay As You Go

product.Name: 1 day West Midlands Diamond CHILD Ticket
product.Description:
For children aged 5-15 inclusive.

Unlimited use on any Diamond bus* within the West Midlands area and service numbers 16 & 50 operated by Diamond for 1 day.

Buy with cash or Swift Pay As You Go.

*Excludes school & Park & Ride services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.
product.Summary: Valid all Diamond buses in the West Midlands only

product.Name: 1 day West Midlands Diamond FAMILY Ticket
product.Description:
For a maximum of 2 adults and up to 4 children (aged 5-15). There must be at least 1 adult and 1 child in the group.

Unlimited use on any Diamond bus* within the West Midlands area and service numbers 16 & 50 operated by Diamond for 1 day.

Buy with cash or Swift Pay As You Go.

*Excludes school & Park & Ride services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.
product.Summary: Valid all Diamond buses in the West Midlands only

product.Name: 1 day West Midlands Diamond Ticket
product.Description:

product.Name: 1 week Black Country Faresaver
product.Description:
Valid on all National Express West Midlands buses in the Black Country only..

This travel product is now issued on the Swift card. You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button above or visit New St or Wolverhampton Travel Information Centres.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product at one of 250 Payzone outlets or a Travel Information Centre. Online top-ups coming soon.

For more details visit National Express’ website.
product.Summary: Valid on National Express West Midlands buses only in the Black Country area

product.Name: 1 week Black Country nbus
product.Description:
This travel product is issued on the Swift card. You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product online or at one of 250 Payzone outlets.

Whatever you're travelling for, your daily commute, shopping trips, evenings out or visiting friends, there's no need to worry - an nbus ticket is all you need.

Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use.

*Valid on bus services in the specified area run by operators in the nbus Ticket Scheme .
product.Summary: Unlimited travel on all buses*, all day in the Black Country Area

product.Name: 1 week City Connect Johnsons
product.Description:
This product is issued on the href="http://myswiftcard.com "> Swift card . You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product through your Swift account. href="https://my.swiftcard.org.uk/ssp/swift/ng-app.jsp#/mainEntrance"> Log in , , select the card you'd like to top-up tell us what you'd like to add to your card, then click to checkout. Then all you need to do is collect. Use the href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.unicard.swift&hl=en_GB"> Swift Card app , or at over 100 on-street href=" https://www.networkwestmidlands.com/swift/topping-up/#swift-collector "> Swift Collectors , to load your ticket to your card.
product.Summary: Unlimited travel onhref=" https://journeyplanner.networkwestmidlands.com/Timetables/twm_09150_%20_H_y11/1/Outbound/0 "> Johnsons 150 service between Birmingham, Redditch and Worcester

Allows unlimited regional bus * plus train travel within the specified Network West Midlands rail zones. Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use below.

The nnetwork ticket can also benefit the whole family and friends with the Friends and Family Fare allowing them to travel with you for next to nothing on the train.

product.Description:
This travel product is issued on the Swift card. You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product online or at one of 250 Payzone outlets.

Whatever you're travelling for, your daily commute, shopping trips, evenings out or visiting friends, there's no need to worry - an nbus ticket is all you need.

Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use.

*Valid on bus services in the specified area run by operators in the nbus Ticket Scheme .

product.Name: Big Sleuth Pay As You Go
product.Description:
The cashless way to buy day tickets and single fares for the bus and tram.

No more hassle finding the exact change, just ask your bus or tram driver for your ticket when you board. With most bus operators accepting Pay As You Go and offering a discount, as well as discounted fares on Midland Metro, if you pay cash on the bus or tram then switch today to start saving.

This special edition Big Sleuth card works in exactly the same way as the standard Pay As You Go card, except that £3 of the total £13 transaction will be donated to the Birmingham Children’s Hospital. You can buy a standard PAYG card, without the £3 donation here.

Please allow 5 working days for delivery.

It's perfect for exploring the Big Sleuth trail this summer. It’s also a great option for kids as it takes away the worry of them not having enough money to get home, and you can still use a 16-18 photocard to buy child fares. You can also share your Pay As You Go credit with family and friends who can use your card when you're not.

Once you've spent your initial £10 credit, you can keep topping the card up with between £10 and £50 using our handy click and collect service, your local Travel Centre or over 250 Payzone outlet.

For a truly smart experience turn on Auto Top-Up. By using your online account linked to a bank card we can keep your card ready to use. When your credit reaches £10 or less, the card reader on the bus will automatically top it up with £20, £30 or £40 – whichever amount you choose.

You can find out more about our range of handy day tickets and the discount with Pay As You Go here.

To find out if your bus operator accepts Pay As You Go, click here and select their name from the list.
product.Summary: Special edition £13 Swift Pay As You Go card, including £3 donation to Birmingham Children’s Hospital.

The nbus ticket offers unlimited bus travel all bus operator services* and the Metro throughout the Network West Midlands area plus an addtional 15 out of county areas.

It covers all school and college travel as well any extra journeys you need to make during the evening and weekends.

Buying by Direct Debit offers:

  • 2 Months free travel - get 12 months travel for the price of 10. Payments made over 10 months only.
  • Great value - discounted travel compared to weekly, 4 weekly and term tickets.
  • Convenience- no more queuing for tickets we deliver straight to your door
  • Save straight away - apply online today and you can buy your first months ticket by debit or credit card. No extra travel costs whilst waiting for your account to be set up.
  • Hassle free - follow the link below to complete the quick and easy online application

*Valid on bus services in the specified area run by operators in the nBus Ticket Scheme .

product.Name: Diamond Kidderminster Month Ticket
product.Description:
This product is issued on the href="http://myswiftcard.com "> Swift card . You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product through your Swift account. href="https://my.swiftcard.org.uk/ssp/swift/ng-app.jsp#/mainEntrance"> Log in , , select the card you'd like to top-up tell us what you'd like to add to your card, then click to checkout. Then all you need to do is collect. *Some service exceptions may apply (closed door services) - See individual service pages on our website for information..

product.Name: Friends & Family ADULT
product.Description:
Valid after 0930 Monday to Friday and all day weekends and Bank Holidays between any two Network West Midlands rail stations in standard class accommodation.

Only valid when travelling with a nNetwork or nTrain Season Ticket holder whose ticket is valid for 1 week or more and covers the same rail zones. Not valid with the nnetwork 2 week Off-Peak, nnetwork student, Concessionary passes, child or pre-9.30 tickets.

One adult and up to two children can accompany season ticket holders on the off-peak return train journey.
product.Summary: Return off-peak rail travel within the same rail zones as a valid season ticket holder

product.Name: Monthly Black Country nbus Direct Debit
product.Description:
Now issued on Swift .

The Black Country nbus offers unlimited travel on virtually all bus operator services* throughout the Black Country area .

Whatever you're travelling for, your daily commute, shopping trips, evenings out or visiting friends, there's no need to worry - an nbus ticket is all you need.

Buying by Direct Debit gives you:

  • Massive savings - discounted travel compared to weekly and 4 weekly tickets.
  • Convenience- no more queuing we deliver straight to your door
  • Ease - just continue to use your Swift card for every bus journey within the Black Country nbus area whilst you're a member of the Direct Debit scheme, no need to have a new ticket each month.
  • Security - Swift is easily replaced with one simple phone call
  • Hassle free -use the apply button above to complete the quick and easy online application. Swift online accounts coming soon for Direct Debit customers

*Valid on bus services in the Black Country area run by operators in the nbus Ticket Scheme.
product.Summary: Travel on all buses, all day in the Black Country area

product.Name: Monthly Coventry Diamond CHILD Ticket
product.Description:
For children aged 5-15 inclusive and holders of the Network West Midlands 16-18 photocard.

Unlimited use on any Black Diamond, Blue Diamond or Red Diamond bus* within the Coventry area and service numbers 16 & 50 operated by Diamond for 1 month.

Passes can be purchased online or via the Head Office.

*Excludes school services, Park & Ride service, and Atherstone & Warwickshire services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.
product.Summary: Valid on all Diamond buses in Coventry

product.Name: Monthly Coventry Diamond Ticket
product.Description:
Unlimited use on any Diamond bus* within the Coventry area for 1 month.

Passes can be purchased online or via the Head Office.

*Excludes school services, Park & Ride service, and Atherstone & Warwickshire services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.

product.Name: Monthly DirectDebit nnetwork Zone 1
product.Description:
Now issued on Swift .

Allows unlimited regional bus * plus train travel within the specified Network West Midlands rail zones. Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use below.

The nnetwork ticket can also benefit the whole family and friends with the Friends and Family Fare allowing them to travel with you for next to nothing on the train.

Buying by Direct Debit offers you:

  • Massive savings - discounted travel compared to weekly and 4 weekly tickets.
  • Convenience- no more queuing for tickets we deliver straight to your door
  • Ease - just continue to use your Swift card each time you travel whilst you're a member of the Direct Debit scheme, no need to have a new ticket each month.
  • Security - Swift is easily replaced with one simple phone call
  • Hassle free -use the apply button above to complete the quick and easy online application. Swift online accounts coming soon for Direct Debit customers

*Valid on bus services in the West Midlands county and the specified areas as outlined in the bus map, run by operators in the Centrocard Ticket Scheme .

product.Name: Monthly Regional nbus Direct Debit
product.Description:
Now issued on Swift .

The Regional nbus offers unlimited travel on virtually all bus operator services* throughout the Network West Midlands area plus an additional 15 out of county areas.

Whatever you're travelling for, your daily commute, shopping trips, evenings out or visiting friends, there's no need to worry - an nbus ticket is all you need.

Buying by Direct Debit gives you:

  • Massive savings - discounted travel compared to weekly and 4 weekly tickets.
  • Convenience- no more queuing we deliver straight to your door
  • Ease - just continue to use your Swift card for every bus journey throughout the nbus area whilst you're a member of the Direct Debit scheme, no need to have a new ticket each month.
  • Security - Swift is easily replaced with one simple phone call
  • Hassle free -use the apply button above to complete the quick and easy online application. Swift online accounts coming soon for Direct Debit customers

*Valid on bus services in the specified area run by operators in the nbus Ticket Scheme .
product.Summary: Regional travel on all buses, all day

product.Name: National Express Scholar 2 Term
National Express Scholar 3 Term
National Express Scholar Spring Term
National Express Scholar Summer Term
National Express Scholar Winter Term
product.Summary: Not for sale LEA only

product.Name: nbus Multi-day 10
product.Description:
Buy 10- tickets in advance on a special nbus multi-day card. They’re cheaper than buying from the driver each day and give you the flexibility to use as and when you want.

Each ticket is valid for one days worth of travel.

It’s so easy to use. Just place and hold your Swift card on the card reader each time you travel. This will activate one day ticket. You then just keep placing your card on the reader for the rest of the day.

*Valid on bus services run by operators in the nbus Ticket Scheme .
product.Summary: Buy your nbus day tickets in advance for less. Gives you unlimited travel on all buses*, all day in the Network West Midlands area

product.Name: Network Termlink STUDENT Ticket
product.Description:
Only available to students who are in full time education.

Unlimited use on any Diamond bus for one academic term in Worcestershire, Wyvern & the West Midlands.

Passes can be purchased via the Head Office.

Term Dates:

  • Term 1 01 Sept 2017 – 31 Dec 2017
  • Term 2 01 Jan 2018 – 15 Apr 2018
  • Term 3 16 Apr 2018 – 31 Jul 2018

*Excludes Park & Ride services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.
product.Summary: Valid all Diamond buses in the West Midlands only

product.Name: nnetwork daytripper FAMILY
product.Description:
For up to 6 people. At least 1, but no more than 2 must be adults (Children 5-15 years). Each family group must contain at least 1 adult and 1 child travelling together at all times.

Allows unlimited regional bus * and tram travel, plus train travel within the specified Network West Midlands rail zones from 0930 until the end of daytime service Mondays to Fridays, plus all day on Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holiday Mondays for one day. Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use below.

Add -on's to some out of county rail stations are also available with this ticket. Check out the alternative tickets below for more details

Buy with cash or Swift Pay As You Go on buses or trams.

*Valid on the bus services in the specified area , run by operators in the Centrocard Ticket Scheme .

product.Name: Regional e-Daysaver 10 Days
product.Description:
Buy 10 Daysaver tickets in advance on a special e-Daysaver card. Each ticket is valid for one days worth of travel valid on all National Express West Midlands & National Express Coventry buses in all areas .

It’s easy to use. Just place and hold your Swift card on the card reader each time you travel. This will activate one day ticket. You then just keep placing your card on the reader for the rest of the day.

product.Name: Swift Pay As You Go
product.Description:
No more hassle finding the exact change, just ask your bus or tram driver for your ticket when you board. With most bus operators accepting Pay As You Go and offering a discount, as well as discounted fares on Midland Metro, if you pay cash on the bus or tram then switch today to start saving.

Joining the Big Sleuth trail this summer? Why not buy a special edition Big Sleuth Swift Pay As You Go card. Find out more here.

It's perfect for part time workers or those who travel less often. It’s also a great option for kids as it takes away the worry of them not having enough money to get home, and you can still use a 16-18 photocard to buy child fares. You can also share your Pay As You Go credit with family and friends who can use your card when you're not.

Once you've spent your initial £10 credit, you can keep topping the card up with between £10 and £50 using our handy click and collect service, your local Travel Centre or over 250 Payzone outlet.

For a truly smart experience turn on Auto Top-Up. By using your online account linked to a bank card we can keep your card ready to use. When your credit reaches £10 or less, the card reader on the bus will automatically top it up with £20, £30 or £40 – whichever amount you choose.

You can find out more about our range of handy day tickets and the discount with Pay As You Go here.

To find out if your bus operator accepts Pay As You Go, click here and select their name from the list.
product.Summary: The cashless way to travel. Simply load credit to your card to buy single, return and day tickets on the bus and tram.
product.AvailabilityText: Valid for use on 26 different bus operators. Check out which ones here.

product.Name: West Midlands Day Ranger - Adult
product.Description:
Day Ranger tickets offer unlimited travel anywhere on the rail network as far as Hereford and Crewe. You can make as many journeys as you like at anytime weekends, Bank Holiday Mondays and after 0900 weekdays.

The areas covered are the Network West Midlands area plus the rail network within the following boundary: Coventry, Crewe,Gobowen, Hereford, Leamington Spa, Northampton, Nuneaton, Redditch, Stafford, Stoke, Stratford-upon-Avon.
product.Summary: Unlimited travel anywhere on the rail network as far as Hereford and Crewe

product.Name: West Midlands Day Ranger - Child
product.Description:
For children aged 5-15 inclusive.

Day Ranger tickets offer unlimited travel anywhere on the rail network as far as Hereford and Crewe. You can make as many journeys as you like at anytime weekends, Bank Holiday Mondays and after 0900 weekdays.

The areas covered are the Network West Midlands area plus the rail network within the following boundary: Coventry, Crewe,Gobowen, Hereford, Leamington Spa, Northampton, Nuneaton, Redditch, Stafford, Stoke, Stratford-upon-Avon.
product.Summary: Unlimited travel anywhere on the rail network as far as Hereford and Crewe

product.Name: West Midlands Day Ranger - Family
product.Description:
The Family Day Ranger is valid for 1 or 2 adults with up to 4 children aged 5-15 inclusive.

Day Ranger tickets offer unlimited travel anywhere on the rail network as far as Hereford and Crewe. You can make as many journeys as you like at anytime weekends, Bank Holiday Mondays and after 0900 weekdays.

The areas covered are the Network West Midlands area plus the rail network within the following boundary: Coventry, Crewe,Gobowen, Hereford, Leamington Spa, Northampton, Nuneaton, Redditch, Stafford, Stoke, Stratford-upon-Avon.

Tickets are valid on the following rail operators: Arriva Trains Wales, Chiltern Railways, East Midlands Trains, First Great Western, London Midland, Northern Rail, CrossCountry andVirgin Trains.
product.Summary: Unlimited travel anywhere on the rail network as far as Hereford and Crewe
